statements: UPDATE product_inventory SET physical_store_quantity = 50, online_store_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE product_inventory SET online_store_quantity = 75, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 2
UPDATE product_inventory SET online_store_quantity = 100, physical_store_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE product_inventory SET product_name = 'New Product Name', online_store_quantity = 75, last_updated = '2021-12-31 08:00:00' WHERE product_id = 105
UPDATE online_store_inventory SET online_price = 99.99, online_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE physical_store_inventory SET physical_quantity = 20, physical_price = 49.99 WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE online_store_inventory SET online_price = online_price * 1.1, online_quantity = online_quantity + 5 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE physical_store_inventory SET physical_price = 34.99, physical_quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 200
UPDATE online_store_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE product_details SET price = 25.99, manufacturer = 'Company ABC' WHERE product_id = 2002;
UPDATE online_store_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, store_location = 'Online Warehouse' WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE physical_store_inventory SET quantity = 50, product_name = 'Updated Name', store_location = 'Main Store' WHERE product_id = 201
UPDATE online_stores SET stock_level = 100 WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE online_stores SET stock_level = 100 WHERE store_id = 1;
UPDATE physical_stores SET product_id = 5, stock_level = 50 WHERE store_id = 2;
UPDATE OnlineStoresInventory SET stock_level = 50 WHERE store_id = 101 AND product_id = 201;
UPDATE PhysicalStoresInventory SET stock_level = 100, product_id = 301 WHERE store_id = 201;
UPDATE OnlineStoresInventory SET stock_level = stock_level - 5 WHERE store_id = 1 AND product_id = 10;
UPDATE PhysicalStoresInventory SET stock_level = 30 WHERE store_id = 2 AND product_id = 5;
